name: HANOI MOTORCYCLE TOURS TO DUONG LAM – 1DAY
description: Situated approximately 60 km away to the northwest of Hanoi, Duong Lam village has been emerging as the best destination for any motorcyclists who dare to immerse in this originally intact world of ancient houses. Hanoi motorcycle tours will pave path for your unforgettable experience in which you naturally discover the local lifestyles, communicating with them, enjoying tasty culinary art and unique architecture. A good bike also help you approach beautiful rice fields on the way to Ngo Quyen and Phung Hung temples dedicated to the biggest national heroes in Vietnam.
